message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $80. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's an excellent investment for you. I'm extending this opportunity to you with a special introductory offer of $75. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.
